description: If you're not a fan of black licorice, this is the most horrifying cocktail your taste buds could ever hope to enjoy. If you love Jaeger Bombs and all, sweet flavors combined with&nbsp;vodka will certainly give you an amazing bliss!
keywords: How To Black Licorice Widow Martini
Black Licorice Widow Martini Cocktail Recipe
name: Black Licorice Widow Martini

recipeInstructions.name: Add black vodka, Jägermeister, and blueberry pomegranate juice to a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Add black vodka, Jägermeister, and blueberry pomegranate juice to a cocktail shaker filled with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well until the drink becomes cloudy in color (about 20 seconds). Strain into a cocktail glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake well until the drink becomes cloudy in color (about 20 seconds). Strain into a cocktail glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish black licorice rope on top of your black widow (optional).
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish black licorice rope on top of your black widow (optional).
